docs.snippet: Mark Cuban’s recent comments about the future of the N.F.L. have sparked a reaction and a discussion....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mark Cuban’s recent comments about the future of the N.F.L. have sparked a reaction and a discussion.
docs.abstract: Harvey Araton On Pro Basketball column observes that comments by Dallas Mavericks owner Mark Cuban questioning the future of the NFL have sparked reaction and discussion; notes that Cuban predicts the league will 'implode in 10 years' because of its excesses and its health risks.

headline.main: Cuban the Firebrand, and the Futurist
headline.print_headline: Cuban the Firebrand, and the Futurist

docs.snippet: A supporter of Stockholm club Djurgarden has died from head injuries sustained in an assault before his team's opening Swedish league match at Helsingborg, police said on Sunday, with the match subsequently abandoned before halftime....

docs.snippet: While a night out at the theater used to be a staple for cultured American men, fewer shows are grabbing them these days....
docs.lead_paragraph: While a night out at the theater used to be a staple for cultured American men, fewer shows are grabbing them these days.
docs.abstract: Broadway musical Rocky is making powerful push to appeal to men to bolster attendance, running ads that emphasize show's sports theme; effort is in response to current scarcity of men attending Broadway shows, which comes at time when overall Broadway attendance is down.

headline.main: In Audiences on Broadway, Fewer Guys Among the Dolls
headline.print_headline: In Audiences on Broadway, Fewer Guys Among the Dolls
